text:
Today you will learn English with 
Language and accent expert Idahosa Ness.

If you watch until the end, you will learn a 
ton of useful vocabulary AND pronunciation,

discover what it was like for Idahosa growing up 
in the USA with a black mother and white father,

and what happens when you do not 
use a language for a long time.

If you enjoy it, you can 
listen to the full interview

for free anywhere you listen to podcasts. 
Just click the link in the description below.

Now let’s jump into the lesson. And if you are 
new here, every week we help you understand

fast native speech without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes, and without subtitles.

Like Nora who can understand over 70% of her 
favorite movies now thanks to our lessons. We

want to help you confidently understand English 
just like Nora, but we can only do it if you

hit that subscribe button and the bell down 
below, so you don’t miss a single new lesson.

Is it important for you to be able to understand 
natives, just like we speak in real life,

without getting lost or missing the meaning?
A great way to practice is by listening to

podcasts. And you can listen to the full interview 
with Idahosa and other teachers and experts for

free anywhere you enjoy podcasts.
However, what I would recommend

is that you download the free 
RealLife English app and listen there.

Why?
Because it is the only place

where you can get the full transcripts for every 
episode and definitions of the most important

vocabulary. This will help you to train your 
ears to understand natives even at fast speeds!

That’s not all!
You will also improve

your speaking because it is the only place that 
by simply touching a button you can practice your

English anytime, anywhere in a safe and supportive 
environment! Plus, you will discover new cultures

and make English speaking friends.
I bet this all sounds like

a dream come true, right?
Well now with the RealLife English app

it is true. So download the app for free 
by searching for RealLife English in the

Apple App or Google Play store. Or you can just 
click up here or down in the description below.

Have you had a ball [had fun] learning 
with Idahosa today? Remember that you

can listen to the full interview for free 
with a transcript and start training your

ears to understand fast English speech 
by downloading the RealLife English app.

Oh, and you can also check out 
another lesson with Idahosa

over on our RealLife English channel! 
Let’s check out a clip of that:
